title: Cy-believers 1
description: Rui has just transferred to a new school. Hoping to make new friends, she decides to join some clubs, only to find that they have all been shut down - by her fiance! Determined to thwart her controlling, selfish betrothed, Rui starts a new club that won't be so easy to shut down. Welcome to the Computer Believers!
author: Shioko Mizuki
